channel.title: Database Principles on Have a nice day, cheio

item.title: LeetCode mySql
item.description: 175 SELECT FirstName, LAStName, City, State FROM person LEFT JOIN address ON person.personID = address.personID; 左外连接，除去address中person没有的元祖 ``` 176 SELECT max(Salary) AS SecondHighestSalary FROM Employee WHERE salary NOT IN (SELECT max(Salary) FROMEmployee); 子查询得到最大值，外层查询的最大值满足小于子查询的最大值 ``` 177 CREATE FUNCTION getNthHighestSalary(N INT) RETURNS INT BEGIN RETURN(SELECT DISTINCT c.salary FROM(SELECT a.salary AS salary, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.salary) FROM employee AS bWHERE b.salary >= a.salary) AS _row FROM employee AS a) AS c WHEREc.
